      • maritimeTrade

        public void maritimeTrade(int playerID,
                 int ratio,
                 ResourceType inputResource,
                 ResourceType outputResource)
        Used to execute trades involving ports
        Parameters:
        playerID - ID of player trading
        ratio - Ratio of trade(ie for 3:1 the value of ratio would be 3)
        inputResource - Resource player gives
        outputResource - Resource player receives
